tasks.task_description: Research and select optimal audio analysis libraries for pitch detection
Create basic HTML structure with audio recording interface
Implement Web Audio API for recording and playback
Build pitch detection engine with 90% accuracy target
Create 12 swarasthana mapping system for Carnatic music
Implement glide detection and seminote filtering
Add drone sound generator for base pitch reference
Design responsive UI for note visualization
Add export functionality for audio and notation data
Add PWA manifest for cross-platform installation

description: Create Carnatic music analysis web application with audio recording, pitch detection, svara recognition, and lyric synchronization
context: Researched audio analysis libraries. Selected Pitchy for pitch detection due to speed and accuracy. Created research document with technical recommendations.
Created main HTML structure with UI controls for base pitch selection, notation style toggle, language selection, recording controls, and visualization areas.

Created comprehensive JavaScript application with Web Audio API recording, Pitchy.js pitch detection, 12 swarasthana mapping, glide detection, seminote filtering, drone generator, and export functionality. Implemented real-time visualization and analysis features.

Completed multi-language support with IAST transliteration, syllable-to-note synchronization engine, and PWA manifest. Enhanced the app with language-specific svara names and automatic syllable processing for Kannada, Telugu, Hindi, Sanskrit, and English.
